function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Extended delays in receiving materials and products from suppliers","Impact":"Disruption in supply chain, leading to production delays and economic losses","Mitigation":"Diversify supplier base, use alternative transportation methods, stockpile essential materials","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, real-time tracking systems, AI predictive analytics","People":"Supply chain managers, production managers, procurement teams","Owner":"Supply chain management, procurement teams, logistics teams"},{"Description":"Workforce reductions through furloughs, layoffs, and terminations","Impact":"Loss of skilled labor, decreased productivity, negative impact on employee well-being","Mitigation":"Implement flexible work models, provide training for alternative roles, support mental health programs","Technologies":"HR management software, virtual collaboration tools, employee well-being apps","People":"HR managers, team leaders, employees","Owner":"HR departments, leadership teams"},{"Description":"Perceived long-term viability concerns for organizations","Impact":"Decreased investor confidence, potential financial collapse, impact on the economy","Mitigation":"Develop strategic plans, seek financial assistance, improve operational efficiency","Technologies":"Business intelligence tools, financial management software, predictive modeling","People":"Executives, financial analysts, investors","Owner":"Executive teams, financial management teams"}]}
